# Government Tender Announcement

## Centre for Surveillance and Applied Research (CSAR) Staffing Services

### Request for Proposal

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC) is seeking the services of two (2) bilingual Senior Human Resources Staffing Consultants to support the Centre for Surveillance and Applied Research (CSAR) in processing staffing competitions. The consultants will provide human resources staffing services, including support for operational human resources requirements, staffing processes, and staffing inventories on an as-needed basis.

### Overview

The contract will be for a period of one (1) year with three (3) one-year options. The estimated level of effort for the contract will be up to 250 hours per year. The Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Method of Supply is subject to quarterly refresh cycles.

### Security Requirements

The contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) with approved document safeguarding at the level of Protected B, issued by the Contract Security Program (CSP), Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC). Additionally, contractor personnel requiring access to protected information, assets, or work sites must hold a valid reliability status, granted or approved by the CSP, PWGSC.

### Implementation

The contract will involve:

* Providing human resources staffing services to support the Centre for Surveillance and Applied Research (CSAR)
* Supporting operational human resources requirements, staffing processes, and staffing inventories on an as-needed basis
* Assisting in completing operational human resource (HR) documents, such as narrative assessments and articulation of selection decision (ASD) forms

### Contract Duration

The proposed contract duration shall be from the contract date to August 31st, 2023, inclusive. The contractor grants to Canada the irrevocable option to extend the term of the contract by up to three (3) additional One (1) year periods under the same conditions.

### Exclusion Criteria

The contract is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS who have qualified under Tier 1 for the following category: 1.8 Staffing Consultant – Senior (2 bilingual).
